content: Create a sonnet using only words that begin with the letter "m".

In mists of morning, murmurs meet my mind,
A melody, so magical, it seems.
Memories of mountains, mightily aligned,
Majestic scenes, where mirth and mystery teems.

My muse, with musings, meanders through the maze,
Of metaphors, and meanings manifold.
Each moment, mastery, in metrics laid,
To capture beauty, in its many ways.

Yet, melancholy, sometimes mars this mood,
As mortal man, must mark life's transient tune.
But hope, in memories, magic freely broods,
And love, a mantle, makes our spirits bloom.

So, in these lines, I'll muster might and main,
To make my mark, in metered verse, remain.
